customer_service_description: Having questions or uncomfortable about the service? Use the Customer Service!
contacts_description: If you are having problems with our service, contact us using one of the information below. We will solve the problem as soon as possible!
question_one: The food didn't come on the promised time. Who should I contact?
question_two: The service isn't yet provided in my area. When should I expect the service to come in my area?
question_three: I have additional questions. Where should I ask it to?
answer_one: Sorry for the inconvenience. First try contacting the delivery service itself, and if the food doesn't arrive on the promised day, we will give you a 100% refund.
answer_two: We are working hard to expand our service to other states. We appreciate your patience!
answer_three: Contact us using one of the contacts below. We will try our best to get back to you soon!
announcements_important: Important: We only operate in the New York/New Jersey area. We will not be able to offer a refund for purchasing in other areas.
privacy_policy_description: All prviacy policy related information is located on this page
purchase_policy_description: All fulfillment policy related information is located on this page
refunds_description: We offer a full refund if the food doesn't come on the promised day or if the food went bad on the time of delivery. If the food goes bad, take a picture of the bad food and send it to (561)-419-1811. We will try our best to process the refund as soon as possible
returns_description: Unfortunately, we do not accept returns. However, there are situations where we offer refunds. Check the refund policy to check if you are eligible for a refund
cancellations_description: Unfortunately, we do not accept cancellations. However, there are situations where we offer refunds. Check the refund policy to check if you are eligible for a refund
